content: I don't have personal opinions or feelings. however, based on critical analysis and viewers' reactions, some of the most impactful themes in moonlight are the exploration of identity and the african-american experience. the film poignantly portrays how one's environment, race, and sexuality can shape their sense of self and how they navigate the world around them. the struggles and triumphs of the main character, chiron, in finding his place in society and coping with his personal struggles make for a powerful and emotional viewing experience.
